name: The Invincible Potatoes
description:
Controls:

  • AD/QD/Arrow keys to move left and right.
  • W/Z/Space/Up to jump.
  • Mouse to aim and shoot
  • R to reload (for example, if mice gnawed through all your potatoes)

Progression: Electrocute potatoes in the ground to wake them up. Electrocute mice to kill them. Move right to see more of the mice.

Made for around 3 hours and a half.

Development timelapse:
